entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023
